CHURCH.IO
a community of people building open source church software
New Alpha Version

An online directory your church will love.

Church.IO Profiles is an easy-to-use web app that quickly and simply connects churchgoers online.

  • Log in quickly via Facebook Connect.
  • Easily create a custom profile in seconds.
  • Search by name.

Install Version 0.1* Get Involved

*Profiles is currently alpha-level software; there are probably bugs.



  • Open Source

  • Ruby

  • Facebook API

What is Church.IO?

Church software is too expensive and too difficult to use. We hope to change that by creating simple, easy-to-use tools and giving them away to any church who needs them.

Church.IO is a community of developers and designers working to affect the world and help churches everywhere by giving freely our gifts and talents.

Get involved by joining the mailing list and/or hopping into the IRC chat room #church.io on FreeNode.
